reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Radio KIM produces and broadcasts informative radio program in Serbian minority language and publishes news for the web. Radio KIM provides 24 hours a day broadcast with more than 6 hours of own production covering territories of Central Kosovo. In this pr oject Radio KIM plans to expand its operation to TV format. Objectives of the project:- Complete media coverage of the local events as well as governance work and implementation of decentralization process- Increasing of local community's understanding of local events and institutions through direct involvement in terms of the issues that matter to them: education health local public services and local utilities- People's control over local governments and local municipality issues through media advocacy wi ll bring people closer to the processes making them express their concerns and bringing government closer to the communities.- Improvement of Morning TV Journal in technical and content manner and adding new materials to our web page multimedia interaction with audience and connection to social networks. Actions will be divided in two phases Phase I and Phase II. The first one will support production of 220 news programs during 10 months, the second one will support building technical capacities of our medi a once other conditions are fulfilled for its own TV broadcast. These phases do not divide project implementation by time but by quality of reach to the local community in central Kosovo. During Phase I broadcast will go through TV Herc in Strpce while dur ing II it will go directly to Gracanica area. Phase I (production) will last whole 10 months of the project since it does not depend on Phase II while Phase II (own TV channel) will most probably start between 2nd and 6th month of the project.
